channel.title: Kulma Reborn
channel.description:
[size=20pt]KULMA REBORN[/size] [i]It's been a year, now it's time for our baby to return![/i]
For those of you who don't remember/know of kulma, it used to be located at kulma.ath.cx but then daiki stopped hosting it one day. I decided to code my own from scratch because I spent so much time on there and I loved it.
Basically what it is is a search site for looking up IDs for certain things like Items, NPCs, Objects, with their ID, Name, and Description and anything else related to it.
Current options on search:
[ul][li]Search for name and description[/li][li]Search for ID[/li][li]Search for only name[/li][/ul]
Things still left to do:
[ul][li]Shoutbox[/li][li]Ascending/Descending options[/li][li]Object and NPC searches[/li][li]Images for entries - DONE![/li][/ul]
Go on, give it a try: http://kulma.reenscapeshift.com/items/index.php[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 02:33:21 PM[/size][hr]Cmon, no replies?
